text: I worked on the Reading List Send UI stuff tonight too. got a little confused by the flow so I formalized it. I can upload the omnigraffle file to the NAS on Monday. for now here's a PDF:
shucks slack doesn't give us a preview

I just pushed updates for slideshow in terms of under the hood.   Images are now ripped out of the articles, and SlideshowImage objects are created and assigned to each document as appropriate.  Data for image is also fetched and stored in the db - should be same as how the main thumbnail image is stored.

Sunday report: I worked on the Reading List Touch bug today (touches "falling" through the keyboard, making sure that text field focus was locked to keyboard presence). Haven't tested all the edge cases yet, but it's in much better shape now. I have to step out for some R&R now, but I'll be available again tonight, and whether or not I do more development tonight I'll definitely put together a plan of what I need to do and when on Monday.
Oh, <@U0289USNA>: I pushed to readingList, and there are submodule changes (SWSoftKeyboard)
